title: The Innocent Young Master Lu - Novel Updates

description:
Upon returning to China, Lu Dingning became the substitute for the brother who is still missing.

Disguised as a man, Lu Yining picks up a bunch of girls with her gentleman index all on max and her prince charming smile leveled up! Women are constantly surrounding her and men are getting mercilessly bent in her presence.

Life motto: As long as the hoe is dancing well, there’s not a single boyfriend she can’t steal!

Zong Jize, king of the city, treats her as his brother but ends up pushing her onto the bed.

Lu Yining says furiously, “Master Zong, I treated you as my brother but instead you sick bastard just wanted to sleep with me!”>
